abstract: Baltimore Orioles president for baseball operations Dan Duquette admits there is some truth to reports that Toronto Blue Jays were pursuing him this off-season.
lead_paragraph: Dan Duquette, the Baltimore Orioles’ president for baseball operations, acknowledged that “there was substance” to reports that the Toronto Blue Jays were in pursuit of him this off-season to be their club president.
snippet: Dan Duquette, the Baltimore Orioles’ president for baseball operations, acknowledged that “there was substance” to reports that the Toronto Blue Jays were in pursuit of him this off-season to be their club president.
